name: Robzawar
description:
Robzawar is an addictive game that plunges players into the heart of an exciting struggle for survival in an alien world. As the main character, you find yourself in the role of a tough robot whose spaceship has crashed on a treacherous dinosaur planet.
Your main goal is to survive in a hostile environment while fending off the merciless attacks of the local dinosaur population. With your wits, reflexes and limited arsenal, you must navigate landscapes full of dangers.
Use the keyboard to move and the computer mouse to shoot. The goal of the game is to destroy as many dinosaurs as possible and set a record in the online table.
The fate of your robot protagonist is in your hands as you embark on an unforgettable journey through the dinosaur planet.
